New Records: LeBron and Bronny James became the first father-son duo to score in an NBA game.
Key Match Events: Bronny James scored his first NBA points during the game.
LeBron James scored 26 points in 29 minutes before checking out in the fourth quarter.
Pre-Game Insights: Bronny James reflected on his Ohio homecoming, stating it would be special to play in Cleveland with his dad.
LeBron James received a huge ovation during pregame introductions and a video tribute was played for him and Bronny on the scoreboard.
Post-Match Reflections: LeBron James expressed pride in seeing his son score his first NBA points in Cleveland.
Bronny James described the experience as 'insane' and felt the love from the Cleveland crowd.
LeBron and Bronny reflected on the memorable night during the post-game press conference.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Cleveland fans chanted 'We want Bronny!' during the game.
Bronny James is expected to join the Lakers' G League team, the South Bay Lakers, after the road trip ends on Nov. 6.
